hero.intro: In our time, people are constantly chasing speed, quality, and price
hero.headline: STOP CHASING, START RUNNING
hero.subheadline: towards progress with iamrunning.online - modern, experimental website builder combining {quality} elements, development {speed}, and affordable {price} for any level websites

origin.title: The Innovation Story
origin.content: At 17, our founder had a revolutionary idea to elevate the website building market to a new level. Through innovative approach and determination, I AM RUNNING was born - changing how websites are created forever.
origin.highlight: What started as a teenage vision became a platform that challenges industry giants with breakthrough technology.

technology.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.content: We utilize our proprietary library of high-quality components combined with the latest website security protocols, preventing any type of attacks.
technology.highlight: Our custom-built component system ensures your website is not just beautiful, but fortress-secure.
technology.comparison: While competitors like Wix, Squarespace, Webflow, WordPress provide beautiful but limited functionality, we combine stunning design with ALL necessary backend elements - perfect for both e-commerce organizations and landing page needs.

speed.title: Speed That Amazes
speed.content: With our approach, you can build your dream website at incredible speed. The assembly time depends only on how quickly you provide us with information about your vision.
speed.highlight: From concept to live website - faster than you ever imagined possible.

pricing.title: No Overpaying Policy
pricing.content: Thanks to our pricing model, you never pay for features you don't need. From landing pages to full e-commerce solutions - all at reasonable prices.
pricing.highlight: Pay for what you use, get exactly what you need.

services.title: Complete Solution Package
services.content: Everything you need to succeed online, all in one place.
services.freelancerCta: Get full access to our proprietary editor with complete component library access + AI generation
